title: Flash Mob Surprise
frame: Stage a pop-up experience that dramatizes the core benefit in a memorable public space.

title: Customer Spotlight
frame: Tell a heartfelt customer story that highlights before/after transformation.

title: Myth Busting
frame: Challenge a common misconception with data and wit, anchored to the persona's pain points.

title: Behind the Scenes
frame: Reveal the craftsmanship or team culture that makes the offering trustworthy.

title: 30-Day Challenge
frame: Invite the audience to join a limited-time challenge that uses the product daily with social proof prompts.
